name: Katana
description: Katana is a decentralized exchange on the Ronin network.

contracts.name: Katana Factory
contracts.description: The Katana V2 Factory that creates new Katana V2 pools

contracts.name: Permissioned Router
contracts.description: The current router for swaps and add/remove liquidity on V2 pools

contracts.name: Affiliate Router
contracts.description: Like Permissioned Router but with affiliate fees

contracts.name: Katana Governance
contracts.description: The Katana Governance contract manages the DEX

contracts.name: ERC20 Staking Proxy Factory Proxy
contracts.description: The factory to create new farm pools
